verses.verse: These<WH428> are the words<WH1697> which<WH834> Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> to all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> across<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383> in the wilderness,<WH4057> in the Arabah<WH6160> opposite<WH4136> Suph,<WH5489> between<WH996> Paran<WH6290> and Tophel<WH8603> and Laban<WH9227> and Hazeroth<WH2698> and Dizahab.<WH1774>
It is eleven<WH259> <WH6240> days' [journey] from Horeb<WH2722> by the way<WH1870> of Mount<WH2022> Seir<WH8165> to Kadesh-barnea.

And it came<WH1961> about in the fortieth<WH705> year,<WH8141> on the first<WH259> day of the eleventh<WH6249> <WH6240> month,<WH2320> that Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> according to all<WH3605> that the Lord<WH3068> had commanded<WH6680> him [to give] to them,

after<WH310> he had defeated<WH5221> Sihon<WH5511> the king<WH4428> of the Amorites,<WH567> who<WH834> lived<WH3427> in Heshbon,<WH2809> and Og<WH5747> the king<WH4428> of Bashan,<WH1316> who<WH834> lived<WH3427> in Ashtaroth<WH6252> and Edrei.<WH154>
Across<WH5676> the Jordan<WH3383> in the land<WH776> of Moab,<WH4124> Moses<WH4872> undertook<WH2974> to expound<WH874> this<WH2088> law,<WH8451> saying,<WH559>
"The Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430> spoke<WH1696> to us at Horeb,<WH2722> saying,<WH559> 'You have stayed<WH3427> long<WH7227> enough<WH7227> at this<WH2088> mountain.<WH2022>

'Turn<WH6437> and set<WH5265> your journey,<WH5265> and go<WH935> to the hill<WH2022> country<WH2022> of the Amorites,<WH567> and to all<WH3605> their neighbors<WH7934> in the Arabah,<WH6160> in the hill<WH2022> country<WH2022> and in the lowland<WH8219> and in the Negev<WH5045> and by the seacoast,<WH3220> <WH2348> the land<WH776> of the Canaanites,<WH3669> and Lebanon,<WH3844> as far<WH5704> as the great<WH1419> river,<WH5104> the river<WH5104> Euphrates.<WH6578>

'See,<WH7200> I have placed<WH5414> the land<WH776> before<WH6440> you; go<WH935> in and possess<WH3423> the land<WH776> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> swore<WH7650> to give<WH5414> to your fathers, to Abraham,<WH1> to Isaac,<WH85> and to Jacob,<WH3327> to them and their descendants<WH3290> after<WH2233> them.'
"And I spoke<WH559> to you at that time,<WH6256> saying,<WH559> 'I am not able<WH3201> to bear<WH5375> [the burden] of you alone.<WH905>
'The Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has multiplied<WH7235> you, and behold,<WH2009> you are this day<WH3117> as the stars<WH3556> of heaven<WH8064> for multitude.<WH7230>
'May the Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of your fathers, increase<WH1> you a thousand-fold more<WH3254> than you are, and bless<WH3254> you, just<WH1288> as He has promised<WH9201> you!
'How<WH351> can I alone<WH905> bear<WH5375> the load<WH2960> and burden<WH4853> of you and your strife<WH7379>?
'Choose<WH3051> wise<WH2450> and discerning<WH995> and experienced<WH3045> men<WH376> from your tribes,<WH7626> and I will appoint<WH7760> them as your heads.<WH7218>'
"And you answered<WH6030> me and said,<WH559> 'The thing<WH1697> which<WH834> you have said<WH1696> to do<WH6213> is good.<WH2896>'

"So I took<WH3947> the heads<WH7218> of your tribes,<WH7626> wise<WH2450> and experienced<WH3045> men,<WH376> and appointed<WH5414> them heads<WH7218> over<WH5921> you, leaders<WH8269> of thousands,<WH505> and of hundreds,<WH3967> of fifties<WH2572> and of tens,<WH6235> and officers<WH7860> for your tribes.<WH7626>

"Then I charged<WH6680> your judges<WH8199> at that time,<WH6256> saying,<WH559> 'Hear<WH8085> [the cases] between<WH996> your fellow<WH251> countrymen,<WH251> and judge<WH8199> righteously<WH6664> between<WH996> a man<WH376> and his fellow<WH251> countryman,<WH251> or the alien<WH1616> who is with him.

'You shall not show<WH5234> partiality<WH5234> <WH6440> in judgment;<WH4941> you shall hear<WH8085> the small<WH9512> and the great<WH1419> alike. You shall not fear<WH9076> man,<WH376> for the judgment<WH4941> is God's. And the case<WH1697> that is too<WH4480> hard<WH7185> for you, you shall bring<WH7126> to me, and I will hear<WH8085> it.'
"And I commanded<WH6680> you at that time<WH6256> all<WH3605> the things<WH1697> that you should do.<WH6213>

"Then we set<WH5265> out from Horeb,<WH2722> and went<WH1980> through all<WH3605> that great<WH1419> and terrible<WH3372> wilderness<WH4057> which<WH834> you saw,<WH7200> on the way<WH1870> to the hill<WH2022> country<WH2022> of the Amorites,<WH567> just<WH9201> as the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430> had commanded<WH6680> us; and we came<WH935> to Kadesh-barnea.
"And I said<WH559> to you, 'You have come<WH935> to the hill<WH2022> country<WH2022> of the Amorites<WH567> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430> is about to give<WH5414> us.

'See,<WH7200> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has placed<WH5414> the land<WH776> before<WH6440> you; go<WH5927> up, take<WH3423> possession,<WH3423> as the Lord,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of your fathers, has spoken<WH1> to you. Do not fear<WH1696> or be dismayed.<WH3372>'

"Then all<WH3605> of you approached<WH7126> me and said,<WH559> 'Let us send<WH7971> men<WH376> before<WH6440> us, that they may search<WH2658> out the land<WH776> for us, and bring<WH7725> back<WH7725> to us word<WH1697> of the way<WH1870> by which<WH834> we should go<WH5927> up, and the cities<WH5892> which<WH834> we shall enter.<WH935>'
"And the thing<WH1697> pleased<WH3190> <WH5869> me and I took<WH3947> twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> of your men,<WH376> one<WH259> man<WH376> for each tribe.<WH7626>
"And they turned<WH6437> and went<WH5927> up into the hill<WH2022> country,<WH2022> and came<WH935> to the valley<WH5158> of Eshcol,<WH812> and spied<WH7270> it out.

"Then they took<WH3947> [some] of the fruit<WH6529> of the land<WH776> in their hands<WH3027> and brought<WH3381> it down<WH3381> to us; and they brought<WH7725> us back<WH7725> a report<WH1697> and said,<WH559> 'It is a good<WH2896> land<WH776> which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430> is about to give<WH5414> us.'
"Yet you were not willing<WH14> to go<WH5927> up, but rebelled<WH4784> against<WH854> the command<WH6310> of the Lord<WH3068> your God;<WH430>

and you grumbled<WH7279> in your tents<WH168> and said,<WH559> 'Because the Lord<WH3068> hates<WH8135> us, He has brought<WH3318> us out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> to deliver<WH5414> us into the hand<WH3027> of the Amorites<WH567> to destroy<WH8045> us.

'Where<WH575> can we go<WH5927> up? Our brethren<WH251> have made our hearts<WH3824> melt,<WH4549> saying,<WH559> "The people<WH5971> are bigger<WH1419> and taller<WH7311> than<WH4480> we; the cities<WH5892> are large<WH1419> and fortified<WH1219> to heaven.<WH8064> And besides,<WH1571> we saw<WH7200> the sons<WH1121> of the Anakim<WH6062> there.<WH8033>"'
"Then I said<WH559> to you, 'Do not be shocked,<WH6206> nor<WH3808> fear<WH3372> them.

'The Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> who goes<WH1980> before<WH6440> you will Himself<WH1931> fight<WH3898> on your behalf, just<WH3605> <WH834> as He did<WH6213> for you in Egypt<WH4714> before your eyes,<WH5869>

and in the wilderness<WH4057> where<WH834> you saw<WH7200> how<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> carried<WH5375> you, just<WH9201> as a man<WH376> carries<WH5375> his son,<WH1121> in all<WH3605> the way<WH1870> which<WH834> you have walked,<WH1980> until<WH5704> you came<WH935> to this<WH2088> place.<WH4725>'
"But for all this,<WH2088> you did not trust<WH539> the Lord<WH3068> your God,<WH430>

who goes<WH1980> before<WH6440> you on [your] way,<WH1870> to seek<WH8446> out a place<WH4725> for you to encamp,<WH2583> in fire<WH784> by night<WH3915> and cloud<WH6051> by day,<WH3119> to show<WH7200> you the way<WH1870> in which<WH834> you should go.<WH1980>
"Then the Lord<WH3068> heard<WH8085> the sound<WH6963> of your words,<WH1697> and He was angry<WH7107> and took<WH7650> an oath,<WH7650> saying,<WH559>
'Not one<WH376> of these<WH428> men,<WH376> this<WH2088> evil<WH7451> generation, shall see<WH7200> the good<WH2896> land<WH776> which<WH834> I swore<WH7650> to give<WH5414> your fathers,

except<WH2108> Caleb<WH3612> the son<WH1121> of Jephunneh;<WH3312> he shall see<WH7200> it, and to him and to his sons<WH1121> I will give<WH5414> the land<WH776> on which<WH834> he has set<WH1869> foot,<WH1869> because<WH3282> <WH834> he has followed<WH310> the Lord<WH3068> fully.<WH4390>'
"The Lord<WH3068> was angry<WH599> with me also<WH1571> on your account,<WH1558> saying,<WH559> 'Not even<WH1571> you shall enter<WH935> there.<WH8033>

'Joshua<WH3091> the son<WH1121> of Nun,<WH5126> who stands<WH5975> before<WH6440> you, he shall enter<WH935> there;<WH8033> encourage<WH2388> him, for he shall cause Israel<WH3478> to inherit<WH5157> it.

'Moreover, your little<WH2945> ones<WH2945> who<WH834> you said<WH559> would become<WH1961> a prey,<WH957> and your sons,<WH1121> who<WH834> this day<WH3117> have<WH3045> no<WH3808> knowledge<WH3045> of good<WH9185> or evil,<WH9563> shall enter<WH935> there,<WH8033> and I will give<WH5414> it to them, and they shall possess<WH3423> it.
'But as for you, turn<WH6437> around and set<WH5265> out for the wilderness<WH4057> by the way<WH1870> to the Red<WH5488> <WH3220> Sea.<WH3220>'

"Then you answered<WH6030> and said<WH559> to me, 'We have sinned<WH2398> against the Lord;<WH3068> we will indeed go<WH5927> up and fight,<WH3898> just<WH3605> <WH834> as the Lord<WH3068> our God<WH430> commanded<WH6680> us.' And every<WH376> man<WH376> of you girded<WH2296> on his weapons<WH3627> of war,<WH4421> and regarded<WH1951> it as easy<WH1951> to go<WH5927> up into the hill<WH2022> country.<WH2022>

"And the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> to me, 'Say<WH559> to them, "Do not go<WH5927> up, nor<WH3808> fight,<WH3898> for I am not among<WH7130> you; lest<WH3808> you be defeated<WH5062> before<WH6440> your enemies.<WH340> "'

"So I spoke<WH1696> to you, but you would not listen.<WH8085> Instead you rebelled<WH4784> against<WH854> the command<WH6310> of the Lord,<WH3068> and acted<WH2102> presumptuously<WH2102> and went<WH5927> up into the hill<WH2022> country.<WH2022>

"And the Amorites<WH567> who lived<WH3427> in that hill<WH2022> country<WH2022> came<WH3318> out against<WH7122> you, and chased<WH7291> you as bees<WH1682> do,<WH6213> and crushed<WH3807> you from Seir<WH8165> to Hormah.<WH2767>
"Then you returned<WH7725> and wept<WH1058> before<WH6440> the Lord;<WH3068> but the Lord<WH3068> did not listen<WH8085> to your voice,<WH6963> nor<WH3808> give<WH238> ear<WH238> to you.
"So you remained<WH3427> in Kadesh<WH6946> many<WH7227> days,<WH3117> the days<WH3117> that you spent<WH3427> [there].
